home.title: WOŚP Barcelona
home.subtitle: Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity in Barcelona
home.description: We are a dynamic community of Poles in Barcelona who for 8 years has been organizing WOŚP Finals and charity events, combining passion with help.

socials.title: Join us
socials.description: We are on Facebook, Instagram and Meetup.
socials.facebookDesc: See what's new. Updates, photos and event reports.
socials.instagramDesc: Latest photos and stories from our activities in Barcelona.
socials.meetupDesc: Join our events and meetings of the Polish community.

joinSection.title: Join our mission
joinSection.description: Every year we organize the WOŚP Finale in Barcelona, raising funds to buy the most modern medical equipment for Polish hospitals.

sponsorsSection.title: Sponsors and Partners
sponsorsSection.subtitle: They already play with us! Join our Partners and Sponsors group!
sponsorsSection.description: Meet our Polish partners and sponsors who play with us in Barcelona and surroundings!
sponsorsSection.cta: Click the bar to see all sponsors

cards.helpDesc: We raise funds and organise activities to truly help children and people in need.
cards.businessDesc: We connect companies and people, creating networking and cooperation space.
cards.communityDesc: We build relationships, organise events and connect Poles in Barcelona and surroundings.
cards.cultureDesc: We showcase Polish culture and values, co-creating Barcelona's colourful mosaic.

finalSection.title: 34th WOŚP Finale — Healthy tummies for our kids
finalSection.description: We play to support diagnostics and treatment of gastrointestinal diseases in the youngest patients. Let's take care of healthy tummies together!

contactSection.title: Contact us
contactSection.description: Do you have questions, want to become a sponsor or volunteer? Write to us!

about.title: About us
about.mission: Our mission is to help children and seniors through the organization of charity events in Barcelona.
about.history: For 8 years we have been working for the Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity, raising funds for the most important goals.

form.name: Full name
form.subject: Subject
form.note: Sending will open your default mail client.
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

page.intro: Contact us – we will gladly answer all your questions
page.volunteerDesc: We are looking for people willing to help organise events. Join our team and help with us!

footer.description: We are a dynamic Polish community in Barcelona organising WOŚP finales and charity events for years.

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.description: Together we create good! This page presents the companies and institutions that support WOŚP Barcelona. Thank you for every form of help.

cta.title: Want to become a sponsor or partner?
cta.subtitle: Get in touch – we will prepare a tailored collaboration proposal.
